title: Eisenhower
brief_description: A biography of former President Eisenhower covering his experiences during World War II, his presidency at Columbia University, the formation of NATO, his visit to Korea and his years in the White House.
description: A biography of former President Eisenhower covering his experiences during World War II, his presidency at Columbia University, the formation of NATO, his visit to Korea and his years in the White House.
